entry.title: SPECIAL AIR QUALITY STATEMENT , Vernon
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 02:05 AM PST Thursday 09 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -1.0°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Vernon 09:00 AM PST Thursday 09 March 2023
Temperature: -1.0°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.0 kPa rising
Humidity: 56 %
Wind Chill: -3
Dewpoint: -8.6°C
Wind: E 5 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 3
